des: "I was craving StarbucksÂ® chocolate chai tea latte when I made this. It is not a copycat recipe, simply tasty and easy. International DelightÂ® 'Sweet Cream' is fabulous in this, if you like sweet coffee. Cardamom gives it the slight licorice taste; if you omit it, that's fine too."
ins: Mix sugar, cocoa powder, cinnamon, salt, ginger, pepper, cloves, and cardamom together in an airtight container; seal and shake.
